Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System - Ceftazidime 0.5-64 μg/mL
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with ceftazidime panels for rapid AST of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria and Gram-positive isolates from pure culture, for Enterobacteriaceae, Non-Enterobacteriaceae, and genera Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus, using ceftazidime 0.5-64 μg/mL panels.
